name: Doodled Room
description:
A small game made for the Mini Jam 82 with the Theme: Doodle. 
The Limitation was: Only one room! 
------
What is this game about?? 
You are in a room and somehow someone manages to paint the walls in front of you by sudden magic. No, just kidding. You have to search for small hidden Symbols/Objects to see more doodles in that room 
----
How to play?? 
Just use your mouse and enjoy the drawings! 
----
Enjoy!
